"Ohhhhhh, it's not that easy to join the Decepticons old friend. No, you
joined the Predacons, and must prove yourself. But not right now. I have
other matters to attend to as of right now." Megatron says, deactivating
the energy bonds, and then turns around, leaving towards the Main
control room.
